headline: Inside Ford's new world headquarters: Scratch kitchens, rotisserie chickens and design secrets
summary: Ford's new 2.1-million-square-foot headquarters in Dearborn, Michigan, is ceremoniously opening Sunday, although construction is expected to continue into 2027.
